oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cultivated fields near Springfield, Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Croplands; Haystacks
Agriculture
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Arable land showing haystacks and lines of trees in the distance.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: G.H.A.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Robertson County was named for General James Roberston. The county was established by the General Assembly in 1796. It covered 477 square miles and contained 304,640 acres.
